message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. We can negotiate further if you'd like.
I'll give you a slightly better deal. Your turn to improve!
I appreciate your offer, but I think we can do better. I'll give you 45, but I need 55 to make it worth my while after the inflation.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away too much. Take it or leave it!
